Title: Requires the board of education of the city school district of the city of Rochester to submit a proposition on school governance
Summary: Requires the board of education of the city school district of the city of Rochester to submit a proposition on school governance; requires the commissioner of education and the board of regents to establish an improvement plan for the city of Rochester school district.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the board of education of the city school district of the city of Rochester to submit a proposition on school governance
